summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Engineering Department; abolishing the Street Use Appeals Board; repealing SMC Chapter 15.90; establishing a process whereby the Director of Engineering may review or reconsider certain Engineering Department decisions; adding a new Section 15.04.112; and amending SMC Sections 11.16.120, 11.16.317, 15.04.037, 15.04.045, 15.14.050, 15.14.080, 15.22.026, 15.28.060, 15.44.130, 15.50.23. 15.50.25, 15.64.030, 15.64.060, 15.64.065, 15.64.070, and 16.60.030.
